title: Her Accidental Lover and Other Erotic Tales
description: Her Accidental Lover and Other Erotic Tales is a spellbinding collection of short, sexy stories sure to entice, tease and please. In Her Accidental Lover, Mirabelle needs a man, and fate smiles on her when she thwarts a burglar. Should she call the cops or seduce the robber?In Special Delivery, Candace is celebrating her birthday alone in a new town. A sexy birthday present arrives at her doorstep, and she's given the option to go out or stay in. What does she choose?In Graduation, Elise has only one day left to confess her desire for her roommate, Selena. Will they part as friends or take their relationship to the next level?In The Right Woman for the Job, a good plumber is hard to find. It's a good thing Aiden called Charlie...In Phone Sex, Ashley and Gavin are separated by an ocean, but that doesn't stop the waves of passion that engulf them.Indulge yourself in this collection of erotic short stories and let yourself go.
author: Jasmine R. Fields
